Functions
fza_fnc_compensateSafezone
Description

Takes a cordinate input, and outputs the coordinates to be used within fza_radddisp_nobounds to get that screen position (used for IHADSS)

Parameters

_x: the x position _y: the y position

Returns
[_x, _y]

the compensated position

Examples

(begin example) _result = [0, 0] call fza_fnc_compensateSafezone; //_result => [-3, -3] - whatever [safeZoneX, safeZoneY] evaluates to (end)

Author

mattysmith22, Snow(Dryden)
